alu.name: Alu
alu.description: Alu is a simple and efficient proxy frontend using the Wisp protocol.

ddlc-wasm.name: DDLC.wasm
ddlc-wasm.description: A basic port of Doki Doki Literature Club to WebAssembly. Uses Ren'Py Web.

eosdecomp.name: EoSDecomp
eosdecomp.description: An Attempt at a byte accurate decompilation of Touhou 6 ~ Embodiment of Scarlet Devil.

9launcher.name: 9Launcher
9launcher.description: 9Launcher is an actively maintained and cross platform remake of Touhou Relauncher!

iptauriv.name: IPTauriV
iptauriv.description: A simple and efficient IPTV Player written in Rust and Typescript.

hk.name: Haikei
hk.description: An ad-free anime streaming website, with a simple and elegant UI.

midi-m300.name: MIDI-M300
midi-m300.description: A simple website to effortlessly convert MIDI files to M300 3D Printer Commands.

amiami-scraper.name: AmiAmi Scraper
amiami-scraper.description: A simple NodeJS tool that acts as a POC for bypassing TLS fingerprinting restrictions on AmiAmi's API.
